description:
Elevate your outdoor adventures with the Merino 200 Oasis long sleeve crew, the standard by which all other base layers are measured. Crafted from icebreaker's versatile merino jersey fabric, this is the ultimate companion for any activity. As a bonus, it showcases a stunning print of the snow-capped peaks of New Zealand's Remarkables.

  • Merino wool naturally regulates your body’s temperature and resists odour
  • 200 weight merino is on the heavier side of lightweight material and is perfect for those who find traditional lightweight base layers a little too cold
  • Gusseted underarms to keep you moving comfortably, all day long Offset shoulder seams won’t get in your way
  • Drop tail hem will keep you covered in any activity
name: icebreaker Merino 200 Oasis LS Crew Remarkables - Men's
